div.p: THE REPORTS THEREOF. THERE WERE NO MEDICAL PEOPLE ON
THE SCENE, ALL RIGHT? AND FINALLY, THE FACTOR TIP OF
THE DAY PROTECTING YOUR HEALTH. THE ACTRESS, ANGELINA JOLIE MADE
HEADLINES HAVING A DOUBLE MASTECTOMY WHEN SHE WAS NOT EVEN
DIAGNOSED WITH CANCER. SHE DID IT BECAUSE IT RUNS IN
HER FAMILY, AND WANTED TO PROTECT HER HEALTH.
THAT IS A VERY PERSONAL DECISION, AND IN GENERAL,
AMERICANS WERE NOT GOOD AT PROTECTING THEIR HEALTH, UNTIL
ABOUT TEN YEARS AGO, MY FATHER DIED WITH MELANOMA, SO THAT IS
IN MY GENE POOL. AND I GO TO THE DOCTOR EVERY
YEAR FOR POTENTIAL SKIN CANCER THAT DEVELOPS.
IT IS EXPENSIVE, BUT AN INVESTMENT IN MY LIFE.
WHATEVER IS IN YOUR FAMILY HISTORY THAT KILLED THEM, FIND
OUT, CONSULT YOUR PHYSICIAN, PROTECT YOUR HEALTH, THE MOST
VALUABLE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. THAT IS IT FOR US TODAY, GO TO
